Reviews.Title: “Nice studio!”
Reviews.Author: Nathalie M
Reviews.Content: The staff was very friendly. The studio is very nice with the kitchenette, you get the basic pottery to cook. The pool is very nice, very clean. If you stay less than a week you pay 50 dollars a night and you get fresh towels everyday and they clean everyday. However, if you stay longer you only have to pay 38 dollars a night but they only clean an give you fresh towels once a week. Very nice studio!

Reviews.Title: “dont know why all the bad reviews”
Reviews.Author: pjennymay
Reviews.Content: I was realy scare to book this hotel because of the reviews when I got there I was suprise check in went well and when I went to my room expecting the worse I was suprised spacious room nice and clean even smelled good the kitchenette was well equipped it was a nice place pool was pretty good to enjoy outside barbq it was almost the same as staying in the extended stay but for half the price everyone who was there was very pleasent including the cleaning staff they were young but very respectfull and nice so dont let the reviews fool you the only thing I can agree is the beds were a bit hard but I slept ok

Reviews.Title: “Ok for the night and the price we paid”
Reviews.Author: SOLSETA
Reviews.Content: Stayed here for our last night in Orlando after coming off a cruise - we just wanted something central and not costing the earth. This provided clean and comfortable accomodation for the price we paid - $47 plus tax for the night. Yes it was noisy - we had a long term guest next to us with a dog and the tv was on well into the night - I put cotton wool in my ears and managed to get to sleep. Location was good for us - last minute shopping done and the kids could hit Old Town. Would I stay again - Yes, if only for 1 night and the price was good - No , for a longer time.

Reviews.Title: “No vacation”
Reviews.Author: Nomtns
Reviews.Content: If you want to change your own sheets, vacuum your own floor and take out your own garbage while you are on vacation, this is the place for you. Maid service is now provided once a week. Free coffee in your room this first morning. After that it will cost you $1. Floor dirty? Go to the office and borrow the sweeper. Need quarters for the laundry? Don't ask until after 7. Need clean towels and sheets? Go to the office if it's not your day for maid service. There were bugs in the bathroom and kitchen which didn't seem to bother either of the desk personel. We were given 2 rate quotes for the same room the same day. It all depends who is at the desk when you register. This was a pleasent place to stay in 2011. The same can't be said now

Reviews.Title: “The Smell ??”
Reviews.Author: Love2travelHamptonNH
Reviews.Content: I have stayed here in the past and have had 3 different rooms each time. I am not sure, but pretty much think that it is the carpets that smell of mildew !! The room itself is clean and fairly fresh in appearance. However, there is a distinct smell that is absolutely terrible upon entering the units. My advice is to check your suite prior to renting it to make sure that you can tolerate it. Also, bring your own pillows and be prepared for very hard mattresses. As I write this review, I am choking on this very bad odor that I can't put my finger on. The price was advertised for $219 per week plus tax, but the desk clerk charged me $259.00 plus tax, so their advertising is misleading. Again, check your room if you decide to rent here and make sure that the odor will not ruin your stay. Because of this, I cannot return.

Reviews.Title: “Great Value and a Clean Room”
Reviews.Author: mymagicaltoursdotcom
Reviews.Content: The room was much larger than expected. It was very clean. The kitchen was very useful and was stocked with plates, dish towls and everything we needed to prepare meals. The internet service was a bit slow and the (new) beds were very firm. If you love firm beds, you will love this place. If not, then bring your own pillow topper and you'll do fine.

Reviews.Title: “Small motel with huge CLEAN rooms, very pet friendly with full kitchen, near everything!!!!!”
Reviews.Author: FloridaBarbie
Reviews.Content: We liked this motel so much we booked it for two weekends next month with intentions to come back many more times. Very clean, large room...almost like two separate rooms, bedroom and kitchen. Large pet walking area with picnic tables, bbq's. Pool was clean with lounge chairs. Area seemed so safe I allowed my handicapped daughter out alone at night to walk the dogs. Right across the street from Old Town. Maybe five minutes to WDW exit. Supurb value!!!!! A+++++

Reviews.Title: “Awesome value!”
Reviews.Author: Rayrayhernandez
Reviews.Content: Excellent hotel. Our room was clean and quiet. I will be bringing my family here again next year.

Reviews.Title: “Get A Lot For A Little”
Reviews.Author: pennysu67
Reviews.Content: The price for this hotel is wonderful considering what you get. We love having a stove, microwave and refrigerator so we can eat in the room or take leftovers back to heat up later. A great money saver! If you are famiar with Motel 6, this is like a Motel 6 with a kitchen and a little more room. We bring own own pillows since on our first visit here they were a little flat. There is nothing fancy about this place but we enjoy the location, Wifi, the kitchenette, and most of all the price.

Reviews.Title: “excellent place”
Reviews.Author: JanicedG
Reviews.Content: This is an excellent place and location.My daughter and i stayed here last year and this year also just returning this week .Very clean and safe. We love this place.It's handy to everything and we love it because it has everything we need;a full size fridge;microwave and a two burner stove top plus dishes..Why would you go anywhere else?? we love you Studio 6..Keep up the good work!!We go each year to Florida for shopping and stay here at Studio 6..

Reviews.Title: “BEST PRICE IN TOWN FOR SNOW BIRDS PERIOD - CLEAN/GREAT LOCATION”
Reviews.Author: RexTucker
Reviews.Content: If you’re looking for place for day or month this is best priced spot in town. I stay there each winter and I would recommend it to anyone. You might get a spot a LITTLE cheaper down the road but be warned to put on your flack jacket and hide the girls. This place is run by an American Girl who runs a tight ship. If you have problems speak to her and she will take care of it for sure. There are no drug dealers and hookers around this place and anyone who writes a negative is probably someone who broke the rules and got the boot. There are a lot of Canadians like myself there in the winter. So if you’re looking for the best deal in Kissimmee look no further. Book early and remember this is Studio 6 and not Motel 6. Bring your electric frying pan and if you want to feel at home bring your own bed spreads and pillow cases. The old saying "You get what you pay for" does not apply here because you get more.Yes this is a safe clean place to spend the winter if you’re a Snow Bird. I write this knowing I will be there again this winter.

Reviews.Title: “Great accomodations - especially for the money”
Reviews.Author: JandTH
Reviews.Content: Didn't encounter any of the problems we've seen others post on this site. The only glitch in the whole stay was when I was charged a higher rate at check-in than what I had reserved the room for - but this was quickly corrected by the very responsive front-desk staff. The internet connection worked well, the room was large, clean, and comfortable. And for what we paid for it, this has become our accomodation of choice in the Orlando/Kissimmee area.

Reviews.Title: “not bad for the price”
Reviews.Author: songbird1329
Reviews.Content: nice actually. stayed here for one night at the beginning of a vacation. we had a living room with sofa, kitchenette with table and chairs, king sized bed and decent bathroom. does not compare to the luxury properties we stayed at later in the trip but no complaints, good value for the price.

Reviews.Title: “Mixed feelings”
Reviews.Author: islamonroe
Reviews.Content: Stayed here for a week. I saw 1 large cockroach in the bed stand drawer the first day but none after that. (Had bug spay on hand from stay at another hotel the previous week) The rooms were pretty clean and had a small kitchen. The area was quiet and the pool was private and clean. Most of the staff was friendly. I did have a problem with one front desk person. A tall, thin, blonde man with a small pony tail. When I went to the office to ask for a few washcloths he said I had to go and get my dirty ones to receive new ones. So I walked back to my room, got all the dirty washcloths and gave them to him. He said this was the motels policy. Wow, Really? I had been in there 2 times previous and both times people were given new towels and they didn't have to go up to their rooms to turn in their old ones before getting new ones. Maybe I am just being over sensitive? The fact is, the guy was a real jerk and pretty much spoiled the entire stay for me. WIFI was an extra charge of 5.50 per week and it was very unreliable.

Reviews.Title: “Wow, we'll be back”
Reviews.Author: joanne148
Reviews.Content: I was recommended this motel from a customer of mine. Was a little leary because of the price but wow! For what is cost there for a week was amazing! The room was spotless and the beds were comfy. 10 minutes from Disney and 20 minutes from Universal. So impressed will recommend highly to any going to Florida.

Reviews.Title: “Excellent,clean and quiet motel.We loved it and we'll sure be back”
Reviews.Author: hannahb_123
Reviews.Content: we are a family and came in from Lagos Nigeria in Africa.We came with our toddler daughter and immediately liked our room.Good clean towels,bathroom and WiFi.Good cable programs,nice staff,quick maintenance service and yes..we really mean it. the reviews have not all done this place enough justice.did anyone mention that there is a chinese buffet restaurant right in front of the hotel for $5.99 from morning until 4pm and $10.99 from 4pm until midnight. studio 6 is so close to the lynx bus route(for touring around kissimmee and orlando cheaply) and sovenir shops and all attractions.Old town is right in front of the hotel. we had such and great time there and please never let any negative reviews about studio 6 stop you from visiting them.We stay there for more that 3 weeks and had a great time. Studio 6 is the best affordable motel to stay in kissimmee!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

Reviews.Title: “NOT CLEAN AND RUDE STAFF. NOT SAFE!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!”
Reviews.Author: rubycupic
Reviews.Content: The place stunk of mildew and the staff was rude! The front office staff gave out my room number over the phone to an unidentified caller. Good thing it was a relative calling and not some crazy person. Hotel 101 is not to give out a room number over the phone!!!!!!!!!! Another person called to reach me and the staff answered the phone and told the person to hang up and call back using the automated system to dial the room number direct. They then hung up on the caller. The hotel is not safe, stinks of mildew and the staff is the rudest that I have EVER encountered!!!! There is a loud motorcycle that starts up in the wee hours of the morning that belongs to one of the hotel staff who lives in the hotel. Quite a RUDE awakening! Don't waste your money or risk your safety. There are many other nice places to stay on 192.

Reviews.Title: “My New Favorite”
Reviews.Author: Sudlow
Reviews.Content: I just checked out this morning after a one week vacation stay. It's nicely maintained, clean and quite inexpensive. I paid app. $130 for a week, including $5 for a length-of-stay internet access card. You get a nice room, with a comfortable bed and a small kitchen area with refrigerator & microwave. The TV is a pretty dated tube set, but there is a decent selection of channels. The walls are a bit thin. I had the neighbor from hell that would talk for hours on his cell phone, then snore loudly when asleep. This hotel isn't just used by tourists. There are lots of truckers, workers in the area temporarily and, I suspect, some folks that live there when they can get enough money. These aren't necessarily negatives, just to point out this is not a resort, it's a place to sleep. The location is set back from 192 right by Old Town. But, to walk to Old Town, you have to walk to 192, then go down the road several hundred yards to the crossing. Lots of good restaurants in the area. With the lit up towers at Old Town to guide you, it's pretty hard to miss your turn when returning from a very long day at Disney.

Reviews.Title: “Excellent budget motel, best in area, clean , safe, great staff”
Reviews.Author: krissywmichigan
Reviews.Content: We have made this our new vacation motel. We found it by mistake 3 years ago when we had car problems and had to extend our vacation. This is a budget motel so that is what we expected. Extended stay 6 have a cleaning once a week. We found the room to be very clean compared to some we have stayed at. The only thing I can say was there was a bit of lint between the bed and nightstand. I usually take lysol wipe to wipe everyting down in the room no matter where I stay due to son with medical issues. We did empty our own trash each day. The outside trash cans were full each morning but emptied by afternoon. No problems with the maids. One gal was super nice and cleaned our room while we were there. If you do need extra towels or clean linens you can retrieve them from the office if it's not your scheduled cleaning day. We used the laundry facality, it was the usual run of the mill with a detergent machine.The staff was very frinedly. No hidden resort fee. 2 story motel with no elevators.The kitchentte was a big plus traveling on a budget. The air conditioners do leave the room with a musty smell, but it is florida. I have not stayed in a disney , or florida hotel that doesn't smell musty when running the air all the time. The beds were ok. 2 doubles , not the best but not the worst. A few nights we did hear our neighbors tv and dog, but quieted down early.Not to far from disney to go back for a afternoon break. I did not see no odd activities going on in the times we stayed there. The pool was nice and well cared for. Charcoal grills on site. For us the price is great , yes there are a few inconviences but we ar not picky people, we know that going in , just looking for clean, safe. For a room with a kitchenette and clean you can't beat the price. We are average people who are mainly looking to cook some of our meals , sleep and spend most of our time out of the room. Thanks studio 6

Reviews.Title: “For a Studio 6 this was a very good one.”
Reviews.Author: 1funstlman
Reviews.Content: I stayed here for 4 nights and with the exception of my bed not made up when i arrived, it was the cleanest one i have stayed in. I think the front desk guy name mario ?? was very friendly and helpful . I would defenitely recommend this to anyone who asks for a good cheap and reasonable place to stay while down in orlando area.

Reviews.Title: “Good Deal”
Reviews.Author: patriciaviajeira
Reviews.Content: We've paid only 35per day. Nice clean room. big refrigerator. You can cook your meals there. free parking. laundry. well located. pets alowed.

Reviews.Title: “Clean, Comfortable, Friendly Staff, Great Value”
Reviews.Author: 1HoneyBee.
Reviews.Content: I spent 7 nights at Studio 6 in mid-April and was worried that it wouldn't be that nice. I traveled alone and on a tight budget ~ couldn't believe the room was just $28.66. The room was perfect. I'm a non-smoker and couldn't smell any cigarette smoke. Many times I've stayed in non-smoking rooms that reeked of cigarette smoke. There is a small mirrored closet complete with iron and ironing board if needed. There was a single queen size bed, extra linens and pillows to make up the sofa bed if needed. (Some rooms have 2 beds). My bed was very comfortable. You enter the room and straight ahead is the kitchenette and little dinette table with 2 chairs. Refrigerator, coffee pot, 2 burner stove top, microwave, sink, stocked with utensils, dinner ware, pots and pans. I bought bleach to wash down the items I used ~ just to be safe. A Publix is about 2 miles away and I bought groceries there. The Studio 6 is set off the road it was quieter and I didn't hear "road noise". Easy to find because it's landmarked by Old Town which is across the road and McDonalds that is at entrance to the motel. It was close enough to WDW (average 6-7 miles) theme parks that several times I left and returned to eat lunch in the room. Like I said I was on a tight budget. I drove my car and had no trouble getting around Kissimmee to get to WDW. The swimming pool area was clean and never busy. Staff watered and fertilized the flowers/plants, so it was well landscaped. Any staff I met were very helpful and friendly. Pets are welcome for a $10 nightly fee, so I brought my spoiled rotten Chihuahua. You will see lots of dogs "visiting" the dog walking area. I still can't believe it was so inexpensive. Studio 6 certainly met my needs. I will return and Definitely stay here again.

Reviews.Title: “greet motel 6”
Reviews.Author: vantermite
Reviews.Content: we stay at this motel twice a year we love it. great room love the place we go to old town just about every night. the room are big and love the kitchen. the handicap parking is really good we would recomed the motel 6 to anyone that goes to disney and to kissimmee. disney is just a couple of miles away

Reviews.Title: “Don't Overlook This Place”
Reviews.Content: I am a retired person and was nervous about booking this place after reading a couple of the review, but I am so glad we booked here. It is in such an excellent location. You can walk to so many great shops and restaurants from here. We had lots of room and we could have had as many towels, etc., as we needed. The pool was cleaned often- the yard and the rooms were kept very clean. Lovely kitchen facilities. We just went up the street to the grocery store and stocked up the fridge and cupboard. So nice not to have to go out for breakfast if you don't want to. Old Town is just across the street and that provides lots of entertainment in itself. The office staff is very helpful. Lots of folks from Ontario stay here. Everyone very friendly and any noise is all over by 9:30 PM, and there wasn't much noise at all.It is just far enough in off Irlo Bronson to not have the street noise so that is a big bonus. I would definitely recommend this place. We felt safe at all times and there were no drug dealers around anywhere. Lots of parking here too

Reviews.Title: “Nice Rooms, very clean but the drug dealers outside ruin it”
Reviews.Author: Oglet
Reviews.Content: Awesome location and great value, the rooms are a nice size and very clean and new looking. The biggest drawback is the fact the walls are paper thin and the amount of people dealing drugs out of the rooms, smoking pot and loitering around the hotel are a huge concern.

Reviews.Title: “Great value, Clean rooms & only a few minutes from Disney and other attractions.”
Reviews.Author: IL_Family5
Reviews.Content: I was extremely nervous about booking this hotel prior to our trip in June. I searched online several times to find information about this hotel and came up with nothing. (Which is why I requested Tripadvisor add it to their site, so I could post a review and some pics!)This was our first trip to Disney and although it would have been nice to stay on property, it wasn't in the budget. I was looking for a reasonably priced hotel, nothing fancy, but CLEAN!! So, I finally decided I would take my chances. The hotel ended up being exactly what I was looking for. It's your basic, run of the mill, room with the added bonus of a kitchenette. The kitchenette had a full size fridge, microwave, toaster, coffee pot and 2 burner cook top stove. It was furnished with dishes for 3 (which I thought was a bit strange, you'd think they would have had 4), pans, utensils and 2 sets of kitchen towels. There was a Target Greatland and 2 Wal-Mart Supercenters within 5 minutes from the hotel. So, it's convenient to pick up food items. (The Wal-Mart also had discount tickets to all the attractions and some souvenir items!!) Everything in the room was clean. We booked the room with a weekly rate and were advised that the rooms are only cleaned once during that week. We spent minimal time in the room, so this wasn't an issue for us. (We mainly needed a place to sleep and shower!) However, clean towels (bath & kitchen) are available at the front desk. We had no issues with security. Our belongings were left untouched during the stay. They did have safes in the lobby that could be rented (not sure of the price). The hotel sits back a bit off of the road, so it was quite. Though, some friends that stayed (we had a total of 5 rooms) said they could hear the TV from the next room through their wall. The pool was also clean. Very refreshing after a long day at the parks. There were several tables and lounge chairs, an outdoor shower to rinse off, and restrooms. We stayed at the parks until closing and then swam when we returned. The pool hours were supposed to be 9-9, but the card key reader worked all the time. We were in the pool at 10, 11, 12 .... However, the pool is only about 50 yards or so from the rooms, so we kept the noise down. All in all this was a great place to stay for the price. I really enjoyed the kitchenette. Though, I refused to do any real cooking - this WAS vacation!! It was very nice to have the fridge, freezer and microwave. Also, it was nice to have access to the pool in the later hours. I liked the location of this hotel. It took approx. 10 mins. to get to and from the Disney parks and there are several restaurants and other activities (go-carts, mini golf, Arabian Nights, Medieval Times, etc...) nearby. Also, if you need a break from the theme parks you can always take an hour or so drive and hang out at the beach for a day.(We went to Clearwater Beach during our stay, approx 1.5 hrs away.) If your looking for a clean, budget friendly, no frills hotel, this is it!!

HotelInfo.Name: Studio 6 Orlando - Kissimmee
HotelInfo.Address: 5733 W Irlo Bronson Memorial Hwy, Kissimmee, FL 34746
